ResourceHeader.ResourceName: THEMIS-E Definitive Ephemeris and Spin Attitude Corrections (CDF)
ResourceHeader.Description: This dataset contains THEMIS-E position, velocity, attitude and sun pulse data. The data are definitive with added science attitude determination using perigee data post-processing.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E position vector in GEI coordinates
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E position vector (km) in GEI coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E velocity vector in GEI coordinates
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E velocity vector (km/s) in GEI coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Maneuver Flag
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E maneuver status code (XYYZZZ). Values indicate if/what maneuver is being performed. Spacecraft data will be unreliable during maneuvers. * Unpowered flight (Coast): - X=0, Y=00, Z=000 * Sequence Code X: - 0= No Segmentation - 1= Segmented Maneuver * Type Code YY: - 0= No Maneuver - 1= Axial-thrust Maneuver - 2= Side-thrust Maneuver - 3= Beta-thrust Maneuver - 4= Attitude Precession - 5= Spin-Rate Change * Sequence Number ZZZ: - 001-999= Maneuver Sequence Number

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E RoI
Parameter.Description:
Region of interest. Different bits of this parameter give a general indication of the region that the spacecraft is in. The first 18 bits are significant. An active bit indicates the spacecraft is in a given region. Multiple bits may be set simultaneously. The value of the bit is in parentheses in the following table.
+---------------------------------------------------+ | Bit 1(1) | Earth Shadow | | Bit 2(2) | Lunar Shadow | | Bit 3(4) | Atmospheric absorbtion zone | | Bit 4(8) | South Atlantic Anomaly | | Bit 5(16) | Northern Auroral Zone | | Bit 6(32) | Southern Auroral Zone | | Bit 7(64) | Perigee Passage | | Bit 8(128) | Inner & Outer Radiation Belts | | Bit 9(256) | Deep Plasma Sphere | | Bit 10(512) | Foreshock Solar Wind | | Bit 11(1024) | Solar Wind Beam | | Bit 12(2048) | High Magnetic Field | | Bit 13(4096) | Average Plasma Sheet | | Bit 14(8192) | Bowshock Crossing | | Bit 15(16384) | Magnetopause Crossing | | Bit 16(32768) | Ground Based Observatories | | Bit 17(65536) | 2-Day Conjunctions | | Bit 18(131072)| 4-Day Conjunctions | +---------------------------------------------------+

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E spin axis right ascension
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E spin axis right ascension in GEI coordinates.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E spin axis declination in GEI coordinates
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E spin axis declination in GEI coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E spin axis azimuth, Euler alpha, in Probe Geometric (SPG) coordinates
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E spin axis azimuth, Euler alpha, in Probe Geometric (SPG) coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E spin axis colatitude, Euler beta, in Probe Geometric (SPG) coordinates
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E spin axis colatitude, Euler beta, in Probe Geometric (SPG) coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E spin period, regularized and boxcar averaged
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E spin period, regularized and boxcar averaged

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E angle rotated since the sun sensor registered the sun pulse, regularized and boxcar averaged.
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E angle rotated since the sun sensor registered the sun pulse, regularized and boxcar averaged.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Initial Spin Period for segment
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Initial Spin Period for segment

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Drift term for spin rate
Parameter.Description: Drift term for spin rate
Parameter.Caveats: Applies to angular velocity (deg/sec), not spin period.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Spin Correction
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Spin phase correction from definitive position and field model calculated at 1 minute intervals

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Spin axis right ascension
Parameter.Description: Spin axis right ascension correction from definitive position and field model

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Spin axis declination
Parameter.Description: Spin axis declination correction from definitive position and field model

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Maximum absolute phase error
Parameter.Description: Maximum absolute phase error between model and non-outlier sun crossing time
Parameter.Caveats: Errors due to recognized BAU timing errors do not contribute to this quantity

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Number of spins contained in this segment
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-E Number of spins contained in this segment

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Pulse Gap
Parameter.Description: Duration, in seconds, of longest gap between sun pulses in this segment. Long gaps (60 sec or more) will generally indicate shadow periods.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Position (GSE)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft position vector (km) in GSE coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Position (GSM)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft position vector (km) in GSM coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Velocity (GSE)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft velocity (km/s) in GSE coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Velocity (GSM)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft velocity (km/s) in GSM coordinates
